com.worxforus.db

Class TableInterface<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.worxforus.db.TableInterface<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TableSyncDb, TableVersionDb

    public abstract class TableInterface<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Usage: extend the TableInterface class based on the object you want to persist to the database.
    Author:
    sbossen
